title: Inside Larry King's Complicated Mind, As Shown In Late-Night Tweets
teaser: A couple of nights ago, in the pre-dawn hours, Larry King took his Twitter followers on a personal tour of the inside of his own head. It all started at 1:40 a.m. with a simple declaration.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
